name: The Flash 2D
description:
In this game, your goal is to stay alive for as long as you can.
When you enter the game you will see a ufo floating around. This ufo has a beam that rays out energy with health that will help you stay alive. When you aren't in the beam, your health decreases. 
In conclusion, to stay alive, you need to stay in the beam.

Controls

Movement - AD or ARROWS
Superspeed - Mouse 1 (left mouse button)
